duaList.translation: How perfect my Lord is, The Supreme. (three times)

duaList.arabic: سُبْـحانَكَ اللّهُـمَّ رَبَّـنا وَبِحَـمْدِك ، اللّهُـمَّ اغْفِـرْ لي
duaList.translation: How perfect You are O Allah, our Lord and I praise You. O Allah, forgive me.
Perfect and Holy (He is), Lord of the angels and the Rooh (i.e. Jibra-eel).

duaList.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ لَكَ رَكَـعْتُ وَبِكَ آمَـنْت ، ولَكَ أَسْلَـمْت ، خَشَـعَ لَكَ سَمْـعي ، وَبَصَـري ، وَمُخِّـي ، وَعَظْمـي ، وَعَصَـبي ، وَما استَقَـلَّ بِهِ قَدَمي
duaList.transliteration: Allahumma laka rakaAAt, wabika amant, walaka aslamt, khashaAAa laka samAAee, wabasaree, wamukhkhee, waAAathmee, waAAasabee, wamas-taqalla bihi qadamee
duaList.translation: O Allah, unto You I have bowed, and in You I have believed, and to You I have submitted. My hearing, sight, mind, bones, tendons and what my feet carry are humbled before You.
perfect He is, The Possessor of total power, sovereignty, magnificence and grandeur.
